title: # 475 - Chris Distefano, Don DiPetta & ME
description:
Today, I sit down with comedians Chris Distefano and Don DiPetta. We talk about TiTi Jerry, polar plunges, family time, history, Andrew Schulz, The Paul brothers, and much more! 

 

Follow Chris Distefano Here:

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/chrisdcomedy/

Twitter - https://twitter.com/chrisdcomedy

Website - https://www.chrisdcomedy.com/

 

Follow Don Here:

Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/donnietsunami7 

Twitter -  https://twitter.com/Don_DiPetta 

Website - https://www.dondipetta.com
